sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './PeopleSidebar.css'; const PeopleSidebar = () => { const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('This week'); const [totalHours, setTotalHours] = useState('800.5h'); const teamMembers = [ { id: 1, initials: 'RR', name: 'Recekesavan R', role: 'Team Lead', team: 'Recekesavan Team', hours: '24h', color: '#4A90E2' }, { id: 2, initials: 'S', name: 'Sastha', role: '', team: 'Recekesavan Team', hours: '16.5h', color: '#4A90E2' }, { id: 3, initials: 'J', name: 'Jakhir', role: '', team: 'Recekesavan Team', hours: '16h', color: '#4A90E2' }, { id: 4, initials: 'I', name: 'Ibrahim', role: '', team: 'Recekesavan Team', hours: '16h', color: '#4A90E2' }, { id: 5, initials: 'RK', name: 'Ram kumar', role: '', team: 'Recekesavan Team', hours: '32h', color: '#4A90E2' } ]; return (
{/* Top Bar */}
{totalHours}
{/* People List */}
{teamMembers.map((person) => (
{person.initials}
{person.name}
{person.team}
{person.hours}
))}
); }; export default PeopleSidebar;
